column4: I'm on 10.04 and listening to youtube. can I use pulseaudio to equalize the sound? or something else? chrome-
how do I get an equalizer up change my sound? can I do that with youtube sound? Is it called pulseaudio? how do I invoke the controls on it.
when playing the video, click volume control > sound prefs > applications tab
oh you want a full eq? I thought you just meant relative volumes
